subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Women)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Rejuvenated by Coach Lauren Hall-Gregory, the Division III Violets will face New England on Friday in their first N.C.A.A. tournament game since 2009.
snippet: Rejuvenated by Coach Lauren Hall-Gregory, the Division III Violets will face New England on Friday in their first N.C.A.A. tournament game since 2009.
